Package gobblin.data.management.retention.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RetentionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>
    Retention policy around versions of a dataset.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CombineRetentionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>
    Implementation of RetentionPolicy that allows combining different policies through a union or intersect operation.
    DeleteAllRetentionPolicy
    Implementation of RetentionPolicy that marks all DatasetVersions as deletable.
    DeleteNothingRetentionPolicy
    A RetentionPolicy that does not delete any versions.
    NewestKRetentionPolicy<T extends DatasetVersion>
    Retains the newest k versions of the dataset.
    PredicateRetentionPolicy
    Implementation of RetentionPolicy that marks a DatasetVersion for deletion if it does not pass a specified Predicate.
    RawDatasetRetentionPolicy
    An abstract RetentionPolicy for data.management.retention.dataset.RawDataset.
    TimeBasedRetentionPolicy
    Retain dataset versions newer than now - TimeBasedRetentionPolicy.retention.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CombineRetentionPolicy.DeletableCombineOperation
